column5: Hi All, We are heading to Press Lake in mid-September and will be bringing crawlers and salted minnows. We are trying to decide between fatheads and shiners. Shiners are considerably more expensive and I wanted to see if they were worth the extra money. Any experience or advice you can share about either is welcome. Thanks Jay
Either one will work well so buy whichever is cheaper. All I ever buy and use is fatheads, both live and salted.
